summary.span: 命名空间提供在设计时对序列化进行自定义和控制的类型。

span.span: The namespace provides types that support customization and control of serialization at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的类可以分为以下类别：The classes in this namespace can be divided into the following categories: - 可以用于指示序列化程序将用于特定类型的序列化特性： ，以指示序列化程序将用于特定的类型; 和，以指示要用于根设计器的基序列化程序。Serialization attributes that can be used to indicate the serializer to use for a specific type: , to indicate the serializer to use for a particular type; and , to indicate the base serializer to use for the root designer. - 设计器可以实现自定义序列化的类： ，用于从序列化的状态; 加载设计器的文档和，当涉及到外部组件和异步加载加载设计器文档。Classes that a designer can implement to customize serialization: , for loading a designer document from a serialized state; and , for loading a designer document when external components and asynchronous loading are involved. - 接口设计器可用于管理序列化过程： ，以注册或检索自定义序列化程序;、 要序列化程序提供给; 和，提供方法来调用序列化和反序列化。Interfaces that a designer can use to manage the serialization process: , to register or retrieve custom serializers; , to make a serializer available to an ; and , which provides methods to invoke serialization and deserialization. - 可以实现自定义设计器加载进程的接口： 。An interface that can be implemented to customize the loading process of a designer: . - 可用于优化重新加载设计器的接口： 。An interface that can be used to optimize the reloading of a designer: . - 其他帮助器类： ，一个接口，使生成唯一名称的对象。，用于与序列化程序; 共享的序列化上下文信息的数据结构和，可以描述可序列化对象的对象。Other helper classes: , an interface for generating unique names for objects; , a data structure useful for sharing serialization context information with serializers; and , an object that can describe a serializable object.
